alert.note: Alert for Scotts Bluff; Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 23 at 9:05PM CDT until June 23 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Scotts Bluff County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... Southwestern Sioux County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... Southeastern Goshen County in southeastern Wyoming... * Until 845 PM MDT. * At 805 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Huntley, or 9 miles south of Torrington, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Torrington, Morrill, Lingle, Lyman, Yoder, Huntley, Stegall, Veteran, Hawk Springs and Henry. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for the Panhandle of Nebraska...and southeastern Wyoming. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Cheyenne. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for the Panhandle of Nebraska...and southeastern Wyoming.
